name: Throwing Cards
description:
Hold down new game button to start game 

Best played with a mouse! 

You wake up in an unknown room with only a deck of playing cards in your hand. The setting is oddly familiar but you can't quite place why. A faint glow emits from the faces of the cards and you find yourself wondering what you got yourself into... 

arrow keys/wasd - move and jump 

left-click - throw 

right-click - freeze/unfreeze 

left/right + down - roll 

a/d + s - roll 

esc - pause 

r - restart
